title: BYD to focus on imports, shelves car factory plans in India over FDI roadblocks
description: After India's rejection of its $1-billion plant proposal, Chinese EV maker BYD will implement an import-only strategy for the Indian market. Launching the eMAX 7, BYD aims for a 40% sales increase despite high customs duties and indicates potential future investments while navigating the evolving EV policy landscape.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
